name: Super Pong: Inspired by Atari
description:
Super Pong : Featuring 4 game modes.

- RETRO 1972: The old-fashioned retro style on CTR tv screen.

- CLASSIC : A fast action challenging game play.

- SUPER : Innovative gameplay with PowerUps to freeze the opponent's paddle and speed up the ball.

- PINGPONG : A unique way playing PingPong. Swipe the paddle to hit the ball fast. Need to have good reflex skills.

Game Music by s2325
www.youtube.com/channel/UCKrErjK1UDNA4szHmmTEsPQ
